eventInfoList.dialogueText: There was a time long ago, when dragons soared high above humans in the skies of Abaddon.
The dragons grew to loathe the humans, seeing them spread amongst the land as they encroached upon their territory, establishing homes in the shadows of their wings.
In anger, they began to attack the human villages, plunging them deep within wild infernos and slaughtering the helpless people within.
The scorched earth left behind no trace of the hopes, dreams and ambitions of the people who lived there.
One by one, the villages fell, drawing humanity closer and closer to oblivion.
The living begged and prayed, but their pleas were answered only with ashes and despair. It seemed their destiny was set.
Fear consumed them all. The dragons, so powerful and ferocious, wielded incredible magic. They seemed invincible.
However, some did not accept this.
Some looked past the raging flames, and saw a glimpse of what their future could be, if they stood defiant.
As fate cast a dark shadow over them, terror gave way to courage.
One brotherhood of brave warriors rose from the dust of their ruined village...
Carrying valor in their hearts and with magic of their own, they fought back, repelling the dragons and chased them back to their roosts.
From there emerged the First Dragon Hunters.
These noble heroes took back the heads of the dragons they had defeated to bring hope to the other villages, a sign of a new age to come for humanity.
A future without fear, without ruin. Hope glimmered, even if only briefly...
